channel.title: Posts on Modular Samples
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Modular Samples

item.title: Chromatic Loops
item.description: 8 velocity sensetive loop patches for Logic and Kontakt

item.title: MORE wavetables for Retrosynth
item.description: Wavetables for Retrosynth, now with added wavetables

item.title: Lilac jam
item.description: Demo of the free VSTi Lilac.

item.title: SFZ
item.description: It’s been bugging me for ages, a public domain sample library should have better support for open formats, right? Well now most libraries have SFZ patches available. In most cases they’re not as refined as their EXS and NKI counterparts but the basic mappings are there.

item.title: Modular Construction Kit
item.description: I recently added a library of simple(ish) waveforms from a Eurorack modular. Each wave has been recorded with different filter settings allowing for crossfade modulation and other fancy tricks. Patch files are available in EXS, NKI and SFZ formats. Modular Construction Kit

item.title: S612 Library Demos
item.description: Demos of the Akai s612 library
